Improvements.Improvement: Use Optional instead of returning null
Improvements.Description: Returning null from a method could potentially lead to NullPointerExceptions. We can use Java 8's Optional to better handle these situations and make the code safer.

Improvements.Improvement: Check for null in remove() method
Improvements.Description: The remove() method calls current.getValue() without checking if current is null. We should add a null check to prevent NullPointerExceptions.
